info.name: MyGrow, life planner api.
info.description:
Grow API for tracking your life goals.

Contact Support:
 Email: rshuvaryk@gmail.com

variable.description: UUID of the Goal to get

request.description: Deletes a goal from the system

By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
goals in the system

item.name: Assigns a Criteria to the Goal.
Unassign a Criteria from the Goal.

request.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
goals in the system
Adds a goal to the system
Goal could include multiple success criteria, which will evaluate goal's success. Goal can not be closed with unfinished primary success criteria. Optional success criterias could be not finished.

query.description: pass an optional search string for looking up records.
number of records to skip for pagination.
maximum number of records to return.

request.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
tags in the system

item.name: Deletes a tag by tag name.

request.description: Deletes a tag. Also tag will be removed from all existing Goals. Tag can not be deleted if at least one goal will only that one tag left.
Deletes a user from the system

query.description: pass an optional search string for looking up records.
number of records to skip for pagination.
maximum number of records to return.

request.description:
By passing in the appropriate options, you can search for
users in the system
Adds a user to the system
